ngiemboon: Á laa na mbɔ́ɔntè ngùʼ lekùɔ páʼ Jÿohakim, míŋ Jÿosiyásè wembàŋa laa fùɔ pà Yúndà. Mbalug míŋ Neliya wembàŋa ŋweʼe menò mie Yelemî ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé la ne shwóŋo yé. Á gwɔ́ ngùʼ ayɛ̌, Yelemî gɔɔn mbwó Mbalug ngie:
en: This is the word that the prophet Jeremiah spoke to Baruch son of Neriah   when he wrote these words on a scroll at Jeremiah’s dictation  # 45:1 Lit scroll from Jeremiah’s mouth,# 45:1 Jr 36:4,18 in the fourth year of Jehoiakim son of Josiah, king of Judah:  # 45:1 Jr 36:1

ngiemboon: Anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé pa Ésàlayɛ gɔ̌ɔn ńtí gú Mbalug, á yɔɔn:
en: “This is what the Lord, the God of Israel, says to you, Baruch:

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ gɔɔn ngie: «Yée ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ lékúu wɔ́ɔn le! N ne ńgyá ngɔ́ʼ tá Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gíŋ ńkẅiʼi lemÿɔ̀g wɔ̀ɔn. N kwǎʼ ńzẅi tà ńkʉ́a, n te ne ńgẅiin sẅétè wɔ́!»
en: ‘You have said, “Woe is me, because the Lord has added misery to my pain! I am worn out with   groaning and have found no rest.” ’  # 45:3 Ps 6:6

ngiemboon: Táʼ, nkʉ̀ gẅie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔ̌ɔn ngie n tsẅi né gù, é wɔɔn:
en: “This is what you are to say to him: ‘This is what the Lord says: “What I have built I am about to demolish, and what I have planted I am about to uproot    #— #the whole land!

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa na gù, mbà ɔ̀ ne ńzɛ́te memǎa shúm sie é ge gwɔ́ pɔ́ shú.
en: But as for you, do you pursue great things for yourself? Stop pursuing! For I am about to bring disaster on all humanity” #— #this is the Lord’s declaration #— #“but I will grant you your life like the spoils of war   wherever you go.” ’ ”
